en.welcome: Welcome to Rock, Paper, Scissors, Spock, Lizard!
en.rules1: This is a variation of rock, paper, scissors, adding two choices.
en.rules2: The rules for the game are Scissors cuts Paper covers Rock crushes
en.rules3: Lizard poisons Spock smashes Scissors decapitates Lizard eats
en.rules4: Paper disproves Spock vaporizes Rock crushes Scissors.
en.good luck: Man versus machine. First to 3 points wins. Good luck!
